name: Unnatural Selection (itch) (tooManyDogs, Froztbite, Bartosz Przybyłek, poxodi)
name_original: Unnatural Selection (itch) (tooManyDogs, Froztbite, Bartosz Przybyłek, poxodi)
description:
Unnatural Selection by tooManyDogs

Your name is Bob, you recently got hired as a bouncer in a new prestigious club "The Boundary" and you're trying to impress the management.

 The job is fairly easy except for the ridiculous rules the owner sets on who's going in and who's not on that particular day. You need to be on the lookout for people who don't pass 'the vibe check' and don't let them in, otherwise they'll ruin the fun. BUT you need to be quick, the clubbers are waiting! And no one likes to wait!

If you leave them outside the management won't be happy and you'll lose your job. Have fun Bob!

Originally made as a mobile game for a 24h game jam.

Credits:  Daniil Skrendo, Ekaterina Smirnova, Julia Cieślicka, Bartosz Przybyłek, Oskar Bieńko, Bartosz Budka.
